channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 手紙Xの弁護士はブラジル最高裁判所に対し、ソーシャルメディア・プラットフォームは同裁判所またはブラジルの最高選挙裁判所が下したすべての判決に従うと述べた（Ricardo Brito/Reuters）
item.description:
Ricardo Brito / Reuters:
Letter: X's lawyers tell Brazil's Supreme Court that the social media platform will comply with every ruling issued by the court or Brazil's top electoral court  —  Lawyers representing Elon Musk's X told Brazil's Supreme Court that the social media platform will comply with every ruling issued …

item.title: ロシア司法省がBBCロシア特派員のイリヤ・バラバノフと科学記者のアーシャ・カザンツェワを「外国人工作員」と認定、両者は現在海外在住（Laurence Peter/BBC）
item.description:
Laurence Peter / BBC:
Russia's Ministry of Justice labels BBC Russian correspondent Ilya Barabanov and science reporter Asya Kazantseva as “foreign agents”; both now live abroad  —  The Russian justice ministry has labelled two prominent journalists - BBC Russian correspondent Ilya Barabanov …

item.title: 南アフリカの大手メディア「ザ・デイリー・マーベリック」が、広告収入、助成金、フィランソロピー支援が「枯渇」していることを読者に知らせるため、サイトを1日閉鎖（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
Major South African outlet The Daily Maverick takes down its site for a day to alert readers to ad revenue, grant funding, and philanthropic support “drying up”  —  A major South African news website has taken “drastic” action to raise awareness of the “crisis in journalism” by shutting down for 24 hours.

item.title: 2021年の撮影監督ハリーナ・ハッチンズの射殺事件で、18カ月の実刑判決を受けたラスト・ムービーの兵器係ハンナ・グティエレス（Winston Cho/Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Winston Cho / Hollywood Reporter:
Rust movie armorer Hannah Gutierrez is sentenced to 18 months in prison in the 2021 accidental shooting death of cinematographer Halyna Hutchins  —  Hannah Gutierrez-Reed was convicted last month for her role in the accidental shooting death of cinematographer Halyna Hutchins.

item.title: スラックメッセージ：NYTによるガザ戦報道に関する機密情報漏洩の有無に関する調査は、決定的な結果を得ることなく終了した（Alexandra Bruell/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Alexandra Bruell / Wall Street Journal:
Slack message: NYT's probe into whether staff leaked confidential information about its Gaza war coverage ended without any conclusive findings  —  Times Executive Editor Joe Kahn said there were ‘gaps in the way proprietary journalistic material is handled’

item.title: 情報筋インスタグラムは、トップ・インフルエンサー向けに、クリエイターの「声」でファンへのDM返信を自動化する「クリエイターAI」チャットボットをテストする初期段階にある（New York Times）。
item.description:
New York Times:
Sources: Instagram is in the early stages of testing “Creator AI” chatbots for top influencers, which would automate DM responses to fans in a creator's “voice”  —  Instagram is testing a program that offers its top influencers the ability to interact with their followers over direct messages using a chatbot.

item.title: CNNが、クリス・リヒトがゲイル・キングとチャールズ・バークレーをホストに2023年秋にスタートさせたゴールデンタイムの週1回1時間番組「キング・チャールズ」を低視聴率のため打ち切り（Ariel Zilber/New York Post）
item.description:
Ariel Zilber / New York Post:
CNN axes King Charles, its weekly one-hour primetime show launched in fall 2023 by Chris Licht with hosts Gayle King and Charles Barkley, due to low ratings  —  The CNN weekly prime time talk show co-hosted by basketball loudmouth Charles Barkley and CBS morning star Gayle King has ended a six-month run that failed to produce ratings.

item.title: 情報筋ディズニー、「Disney+」内に旧式のTVチャンネルを計画、「スター・ウォーズ」など特定ジャンルに特化した番組を連続配信（Sahil Patel/The Information）
item.description:
Sahil Patel / The Information:
Sources: Disney plans old-style TV channels within Disney+, with a continuous, scheduled stream of shows that are focused on certain genres like Star Wars  —  In television, what's old is new again.  After more than a decade of growth in streaming services that make viewers click on shows they want to watch …

item.title: ベン・シャーウッドとジョアンナ・コールズがデイリービーストの少数株を取得、シャーウッドはCEO兼発行人、コールズはチーフ・クリエイティブ・コンテンツ・オフィサーに就任予定（Benjamin Mullin/New York Times）
item.description:
Benjamin Mullin / New York Times:
Ben Sherwood and Joanna Coles take minority stakes in The Daily Beast; Sherwood will be CEO and publisher, and Coles will be chief creative and content officer  —  The former Disney executive Ben Sherwood and Joanna Coles, the former Hearst content chief, are being given a minority stake in the digital tabloid.

item.title: トランプ氏の裁判にメディアアクセスを提供する交渉の様子。州裁判所システムは、歴史的裁判の準備のために元ジャーナリストのアル・ベイカーを雇った（Charlotte Klein/Vanity Fair）。
item.description:
Charlotte Klein / Vanity Fair:
A look at the negotiations to provide media access to Trump's trial; the state court system hired ex-journalist Al Baker to prepare for the historic trial  —  For months, reporters, lawyers, and court officials have been negotiating media access to the camera-free proceedings.

item.title: テイラー・スウィフトのTikTokへの復帰は、UMGとそのCEOルシアン・グレインジに対する彼女の力を浮き彫りにした。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Taylor Swift's music returning to TikTok highlights her power over UMG and its CEO Lucian Grainge, who must now hope other music groups join his TikTok fight  —  Shari Redstone believes she's found the right buyer for Paramount.  Her fellow shareholders aren't convinced.

item.title: Ofcomのマイケル・グレード委員長は、テレビがより「搾取的で残酷」になり、それが彼を「狂わせている」と述べ、英国の大衆が今や演者として利用されていることを憂慮している（Richard Brooks/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Richard Brooks / The Guardian:
Ofcom Chair Michael Grade says TV has become more “exploitative and cruel”, which makes him “mad”, and worries that the UK public are now used as performers  —  The boss of the broadcast regulator has expressed concern about how the chase for audience ratings is harming the industry

item.title: Netflixの新映画チーフ、ダン・リンが指揮を執り、同社は観客へのアピールやコスト効率に重点を置いた映画戦略への転換を目指す（Nicole Sperling/New York Times）
item.description:
Nicole Sperling / New York Times:
As Netflix's new film chief Dan Lin takes charge, the company aims to shift its film strategy to focus on audience appeal and cost efficiency  —  Dan Lin, the streaming service's new film chief, wants to produce a more varied slate of movies to better appeal to the array of interests among subscribers.

item.title: マイアミ・ニュース紙とパームビーチ・ポスト紙に漫画を描き、ピューリッツァー賞を2度受賞した社説漫画家のドン・ライト氏が24日、90歳で死去した（サム・ロバーツ／ニューヨーク・タイムズ）。
item.description:
Sam Roberts / New York Times:
Two-time Pulitzer Prize-winning editorial cartoonist Don Wright, who drew cartoons for The Miami News and The Palm Beach Post, died on March 24 at age 90  —  He won two Pulitzers for Florida newspapers, commenting wryly on war, segregation, church scandals and more while reaching readers nationwide through syndication.

item.title: ディズニー・テレビジョン・グループのクレイグ・アーウィッチ社長とのQ&A：HuluからABCへ、ABCの継続的な重要性などについて（Josef Adalian/Vulture）
item.description:
Josef Adalian / Vulture:
Q&A with Craig Erwich, president of Disney Television Group, on determining what shows air where, from Hulu to ABC, the continued importance of ABC, and more  —  This story first ran in Buffering, Vulture's newsletter about the streaming industry.  Head to vulture.com/buffering and subscribe today!
